messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Welcome home Rayan!
messages.msgSnippet: Yay Ray! A 9 year old boy in our community just came back out of school after a year and a half. My DH and I were sitting in our living room and talking to him
messages.messageBody:
Yay Ray!
A 9 year old boy in our community just came back out of school after a year and a half. My DH and I were sitting in our living room and talking to him about leaving school and I remarked that I was "really glad he quit school". DH started laughing and said, "You don't hear THAT statement very often!"

Elissa Jill
A Kindersher saychel iz oychet a saychel.
"A Child's wisdom is also wisdom." ~Yiddish Proverb

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Welcome home Rayan!
messages.msgSnippet: Just want to let y all know, if you haven t heard yet, Ray s officially a homeschooler now! Wooo Hoo! We re all really happy about it. Okay, I m sort of
messages.messageBody:
Just want to let y'all know, if you haven't heard yet, Ray's
officially a homeschooler now! Wooo Hoo! We're all really happy about
it.

Okay, I'm sort of panicking about the whole deschooling thing, but
only a little ;)

---Meredith (Mo 5, Ray 13)
